channel.title: Do not go on my server!
channel.description:
I am using scapeRune now and Im mapping npcs and I have a problum when more then 1 person goes on my server the whole SERVER CRASHES AND I LOOSE MY NPCS I SPAWNED
So please DO NOT GO ON MY SERVER AT ALL WAIT TELL I POST SAYING YOU CAN!
if you know the ip fine just DO NOT I REPEAT DO NOT GO ON MY SERVER! cause im mapping and i dont use ::savespawnpoints until I map 10 npcs at a time.
So please I repeat ONCE AGAIN DO NOT GO ON MY SERVER AT ALL I GIVE YOU 2 WARNINGS! BRAKE EM AND YOUR BANNED for 4 days once my server is complete.
ill say it again DO NOT GO ON MY SERVER!!!!!!!!!!!!
Im not leing it does crash if more then 1 person goes on! I will try to find away so dont argue with me on this ok? I know my server is the only one up but please dont go on it! result 4 day ban once my server is ready!
MAKE SURE YOU READ ALL OF THAT OK PEEPS? lol
thank you that is all.

item.title: Do not go on my server!
item.dc:creator: @motherload11 motherload11
item.description:
@motherload11 wrote:

yeah I know iv got it handled thanks guys sw00t!

Read full topic

item.title: Do not go on my server!
item.dc:creator: @Krichevskoy Krichevskoy
item.description:
@Krichevskoy wrote:

Solutions that don't leave your work up to the chance that someone hasn't read this:
1. Turn on a firewall
2. Change server port
3. Disable incoming connections through source

Read full topic

ty silab!!! ty mopar!

nvm ill have to download that new mopar...

it was the 365 .dat files that did the crashing, get the new one and its fine
